author: sky.cactus
content: Why does https://ethresear.ch redirect me to a GitHub login page now instead of the ethresear.ch login page like it used to?  I don't have SSO setup with my GitHub account (nor do I want to).  Was this an accidental misconfiguration, or an intentional change?

author: elasticroentgen_ef
content: just checked the forum settings. appears to be like that since Jan, 2020. At least thats what the audit logs says. Whats you username on the forums?

author: sky.cactus
content: Thanks for investigating.  It does appear I had GitHub OAuth setup.  I also vaguely remember complaining about this a while back now that I think about it.  I guess I lost the debate.  ðŸ˜†
